授業目的: The primary purpose of this lecture is to learn the basic theories of "Economics of Entrepreneurship."
到達目標: The goal of this class is to acquire the basic knowledge in the field of entrepreneurship research.
関連科目: The basic knowledge of microeconomics and econometrics are necessary to attend this class.
授業方法: We will discuss the topic based on the presentation.

トピック.授業計画1: We will discuss the topic based on the presentation.
トピック.授業外学習2: Read the textbook and prepare a handout prior to the class. Review the textbook and handout.
